title: Nothing ear (1) earbuds gain Google Assistant support via firmware update
content:
Thanks to a recent firmware update, the Nothing ear (1) earbuds from Carl Pei’s fledgling tech firm can now connect directly to your on-device Google Assistant, Alexa, and Siri AI helpers.

more…

The post Nothing ear (1) earbuds gain Google Assistant support via firmware update appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: A recent firmware update now means that the Nothing ear (1) earbuds can connect directly to Google Assistant, Alexa, and Siri.
